model.name: SvcModel
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW SvcView ( code string, name string, PRIMARY KEY(code) ) AS SELECT code, name FROM states;

model.name: ServiceSource
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE states ( code string(2) NOT NULL OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '`state_code`', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'CHAR'), name string(64) NOT NULL OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '`state`', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'VARCHAR') ) OPTIONS ("UPDATABLE" 'TRUE', "NAMEINSOURCE" '`states`');
